vote.text: Amendment SA 3684 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3684 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S9588-9592; text: CR S9588) Regarding assistance for Liberia.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3684 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3684 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Leahy.
